name: pool-analyzer
description: Monorepo technical exercise that inspects PancakeSwap v3 liquidity for a given token, estimates depth, and surfaces AI-driven commentary. Built with a TypeScript Express API, Next.js 14 dashboard, and shared DTOs.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n indexer,api,web "npm run dev -w apps/indexer" "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
